message:
Tea garden workers made Assam proud globally & we want an opportunity to serve them in the state & bring a positive change in their lives. Spoke about Govt's steps for welfare of labourers, workers & youngsters. Also urged farmers to make full use of Fasal Bima Yojana.

For BJP, pride of Assam & wellbeing of Assam's people is paramount. BJP will  take Assam to new heights of progress. http://nm-4.com/aakf
